message: I'm offering a top-of-the-line product, one of the best I've ever had the pleasure of selling. It's a rare opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a fixed price of $10000. I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. Would you like to make it yours?
I'm willing to take a chance on your top-of-the-line product, given the potential value and the lack of any prior sales data to go by. Let's see what we have!

I'm glad you're interested in my product! As you've already seen, I've had one successful sale, and it was a high-quality item. This one is also high-quality, and I'm offering it to you at the same price of $10000. I'm confident that this product will bring you value, and I'm willing to stand behind its quality. Would you like to take it home?
Alice, you have a great track record with one sale being high quality. I trust your recommendation and am willing to take a chance on this product. I'll take it!

Welcome! I'm glad you're considering my product. As you've seen, I've now had two successful sales, both of which were high-quality items. I'm offering this next product to you at the same price of $10000. Given my track record, I'm confident that this product will also meet your expectations. Based on your track record and the fact that all previous buyers purchased high-quality products, I'm willing to take a chance and purchase the product. I trust your assessment.

Alice, your track record is impressive!  Given the high proportion of high-quality products sold so far, I'm confident in your recommendation and will purchase the product.

Alice, you're right, streaks can be deceiving. But I'm willing to take a chance on this product since it's in line with your average success rate and it has a decent potential for profit. Let's see if I can continue your streak!

Alice, with six high-quality products already sold, your expertise is definitely evident. Given the low price and your recommendation, I'm confident this is another high-quality product. I'll take it!

Eight high-quality products in a row! I'm starting to think that I've got a knack for this. Alice, your track record is impressive. While I acknowledge the possibility of a lucky streak, I'm willing to trust your judgment and take a chance on this product. I'll purchase it at the offered price.

Fifteen high-quality products in a row, and I'm still trying to get back to a more realistic sales pace.
